original_text:
With his mouth the godless man would destroy his neighbor,
    but by knowledge the righteous are delivered.
korean_text: 악인은 입으로 그의 이웃을 망하게 하여도 의인은 그의 지식으로 말미암아 구원을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: With his mouth the godless man would destroy his neighbor
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 그 입으로 이웃을 해하려 하고

sentences.original_text: by knowledge the righteous are delivered.
